description.p: Updates the last access and last update time for a file.

prototypes.prototype: dim result as L = touch(C filename)

description.p: The file to update the last access and last update time.
Returns *[xb:.t.]* if operation succeeds. Returns *[xb:.f.]* if the operation fails to update the file, either because the file is locked for use by another process or because the file doesn't exist.

page.example: dim file as C = "C:/path/to/file.txt" if (touch(file)) then ' success end if
